attributes.action: Enforce more stringent Rules on the scrapping of Motor Vehicles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
as more and more cars are being stolen only to end up in scrap yards due to the high price of scrap metal at the moment.

Most of these cars are going to Scrap Yards that will turn a blind eye to it, and scrap them without official documentation.
